b:section.class: max-w-screen-xl flex flex-wrap items-center justify-between mx-auto p-[7px] lg:p-0

button.class: inline-flex items-center p-2 text-sm text-gray-white rounded-lg md:hidden hover:bg-gray-100 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-200 dark:text-gray-400 dark:hover:bg-gray-700 dark:focus:ring-gray-600

a.class: header-image-wrapper [&_img]:max-h-[35px]

b:include.data: { image: data:image, altText: data:blog.title.escaped, originalWidth: data:width, originalHeight: data:height }
b:include.name: responsiveImage

button.class: text-gray-100 dark:text-gray-100 hover:bg-gray-100 dark:hover:bg-gray-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-4 focus:ring-gray-200 dark:focus:ring-gray-700 rounded-lg text-sm p-2

div.class: pointer-events-none absolute inset-y-0 left-0 flex items-center px-2.5 text-gray-300

span.class: rounded border border-gray-200 px-1.5 text-sm text-gray-300 shadow-sm transition-all group-hover:border-primary-500 group-hover:text-primary-500

input.class: block w-full rounded border-gray-300 h-[28px] px-10 shadow-sm transition-all hover:bg-gray-50 focus:border-primary-400 focus:ring focus:ring-primary-200 focus:ring-opacity-50 focus:bg-white disabled:cursor-not-allowed bg-[rgba(0,0,0,.2)] disabled:bg-gray-50 disabled:text-gray-500
input.name: q

button.class: absolute inset-y-0 right-0 flex items-center px-2 text-gray-300

b:class.name: items-center justify-between hidden w-full md:flex md:w-auto md:order-1

a.class: text-gray-300 leading-[48px] block mx-[5px] px-[5px] hover:text-white transition-colors

b:with.value: "window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"

b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, shareTitle: data:post.title, }
b:include.name: sharingButtons

span.class: absolute top-0 py-[5px] text-xs shadow-lg rounded-es-lg px-[10px] end-0 text-white dark:shadow-lg

article.class: overflow-hidden shadow-lg rounded-lg grid grid grid-rows-[auto_1fr] post

b:with.value: "window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"

b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, shareTitle: data:post.title, }
b:include.name: sharingButtons

article.class: post rounded-lg overflow-hidden relative bg-cover bg-center bg-cover bg-featured

div.class: p-6 relative grid grid-cols-[auto_1fr] grid-rows-[151px] md:grid-cols-[auto_1fr_50px] md:grid-rows-1 gap-5

b:eval.expr: data:post.body snippet { length: 60, links: true, linebreaks: true, ellipsis: true }

b:if.cond: data:label.name in data:Genre or data:label.name in data:Genre2

a.class: inline-block mb-1 bg-gray-200 text-gray-600 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 rounded px-2 py-1 text-xs hover:opacity-80

div.class: text-accent rounded-t-lg border-accent border font-bold text-lg
w-[107px] h-[151px] md:w-[142px] md:h-[202px] overflow-hidden rounded [&_img]:fit-cover [&_img]:h-full

h3.class: text-xl text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-300 font-semibold mb-2.5 px-1

b:with.value: "window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"

b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, shareTitle: data:post.title, }
b:include.name: sharingButtons

article.class: post p-5 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg overflow-hidden relative post-content grid gap-4 grid-cols-[85px_1fr] dark:bg-gray-800

span.class: absolute top-0 bg-yellow-300 py-[3px] shadow-lg rounded-es-lg px-[10px] end-0 dark:text-white dark:bg-orange-600 dark:shadow-lg

b:eval.expr: data:post.body snippet { length: 150, links: true, linebreaks: true, ellipsis: true }

a.class: inline-block bg-accent text-gray-50 rounded px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs hover:opacity-80

b:if.cond: data:label.name in data:Genre or data:label.name in data:Genre2

div.class: absolute text-white text-xs py-[3px] text-center bottom-0 w-full bg-[rgba(0,0,0,.7)]

h3.class: post-title text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-300 text-lg hover:text-accent line-clamp-2

div.class: blog-posts container hfeed grid grid-cols-2 gap-2.5 p-4 rounded-lg bg-white shadow-lg dark:bg-gray-800

b:with.value: data:view.isHomepage ? data:posts filter (post => post.id not in data:featuredPostIds): data:posts
"window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"

article.expr:class: "content grid grid-cols-[90px_1fr] gap-2.5 index post-" + data:post.id + " blog"

b:if.cond: data:label.name in data:Genre or data:label.name in data:Genre2

b:eval.expr: data:post.body snippet { length: 150, links: true, linebreaks: true, ellipsis: true }

b:include.cond: data:view.isPost and data:post.labels none ( l => l.name in ["Chapter"] )
b:include.name: post

b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, shareTitle: data:post.title, }
b:include.name: sharingButtons

a.class: fw-700 yellow
a.title: author profile

a.class: comment-reply reply-to
comment-reply reply-to

b:if.script: /**/ document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() { var a=document, b = a.getElementById("comment-editor"), d = b.getAttribute("data-src"); if (b.setAttribute("src", d), 1 == comment) { var f = a.getElementsByClassName("reply-to"), c = a.getElementById("threaded-comment-form"), h = f.length, k = function(b, d, e, f) { b.addEventListener("click", function() { var c = b.getAttribute("data-reply-to"); a.getElementById("c" + c).appendChild(d); a.getElementById("threaded-comment-form").className = 'comment-replybox-single'; a.getElementById("addcomment").className = 'comment-reply button outline'; e.src = f + "&parentID=" + c }) }; for (i = 0; i < h; i++) k(f[i], c, b, d); var l = a.getElementsByClassName("comment-form")[0]; a.getElementById("addcomment").addEventListener("click", function() { l.appendChild(c); a.getElementById("threaded-comment-form").className = 'comment-replybox-thread'; a.getElementById("addcomment").className = 'comment-reply hidden'; b.src = d }) } }); /**/
